bibl.title: Aphrodito before Dioskoros. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Preliminary results from a forthcoming Aphrodito prosopography. - The family of Philantinoos 1. - The family of Abba Sourous 7. - The family of Surion 1. - The family of Kostantios 2. - The families of Psuros 5 and Ouetranios 1. - Conclusion.
bibl.seg: RUFFINI Giovanni, Aphrodito before Dioskoros. Avec résumé en anglais.

Preliminary results from a forthcoming Aphrodito prosopography. - The family of Philantinoos 1. - The family of Abba Sourous 7. - The family of Surion 1. - The family of Kostantios 2. - The families of Psuros 5 and Ouetranios 1. - Conclusion.
